title: Food, Sex and Communion
description:
Explaining some of the symbolic relationships between eating, the fall of Adam, sex and how all of these elements come together in the sacrament of communion. 

The subject of this video was proposed by Jacob Russell on Patreon. 

Buy Matthieu's book: https://amzn.to/2yWHhAn

patreon: https://www.patreon.com/pageauvideos
paypal: https://www.paypal.me/JonathanPageau

website: http://www.pageaucarvings.com
facebook: https://www.facebook.com/jonathanpageau
twitter: https://twitter.com/pageaujonathan
